description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for managing recipes, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and rating recipes. It also includes helper functions for filtering recipe queries.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Database model representing a Recipe entity.

classes.name: RecipeRating
classes.description: Database model representing a rating for a Recipe.

methods.name: _apply_filters( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )
methods.description: Helper function to apply optional filters to a SQLAlchemy query for recipes based on search parameters.

methods.name: list_recipes( search: Optional[str] = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None), cuisine: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, min_time: Optional[int] = None, max_time: Optional[int] = None, sort: Optional[str] = "newest", page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: GET endpoint to list recipes with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: create_recipe( recipe: RecipeCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: POST endpoint to create a new recipe associated with the current user.

methods.name: get_recipe(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: GET endpoint to retrieve a recipe by its ID.

methods.name: update_recipe( recipe_id: int, data: RecipeUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: PUT endpoint to update a recipe; only accessible to the owner.

methods.name: delete_recipe( recipe_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: DELETE endpoint to delete a recipe; only accessible to the owner.

methods.name: rate_recipe( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: POST endpoint to create or update a rating for a recipe and update its average rating.

ctags.name: _apply_filters
ctags.signature: ( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )

ctags.name: create_recipe
ctags.signature: ( recipe: RecipeCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: delete_recipe
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: list_recipes
ctags.signature: ( search: Optional[str] = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None), cuisine: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, min_time: Optional[int] = None, max_time: Optional[int] = None, sort: Optional[str] = "newest", page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: rate_recipe
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, data: RecipeUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
